comment.author: 58868147@N00
comment._content: Given that this photo is also from the LOC and from Bain, it seems likely that it's from the same series. Also, the captain's name is Rostron, not Rostrom.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the tip! We’ll need to correct the Captain's name in the source data so that we can keep the information we show here in Flickr and in our own catalog ( http://www.loc.gov/rr/print/catalog.html) in sync.
